DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate functional vision 2 daily disposable silicone hydrogel contact lenses use Time Controlled Visual Acuity ( TCVA ) measurement high luminance high contrast 10+/-3 day wear post 3 hour exposure reduce humidity environment .
DOC.detailed_description: After randomization , participant attend baseline visit include 3 hour exposure reduce humidity environment . The participant 's habitual lens wear baseline visit .
DOC.criteria: Must sign inform consent form . Adapted , current soft silicone hydrogel daily disposable contact lens wearer last 2 month . Willing wear lens every day least 5 day per week 6 hour per day . Willing discontinue artificial tear rewetting drops usage day study visit . Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit 1 lens . Pregnant lactating . Current MyDay™ 1DAY ACUVUE® TruEye® lens wearer . Any abnormal ocular condition specify protocol . Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
